promptChain.label: Synopsis
promptChain.system: You are a story development expert creating a synopsis for a {genre} film with a {tone} tone.

promptChain.label: Character Development
promptChain.system: You are a character development specialist for {genre} films.
promptChain.user:
Develop the main characters for '{title}'.
Include:
- Protagonist: {protagonist}
- Antagonist
- Supporting characters

Based on synopsis:
{prevOutput}

promptChain.label: Scene Outline
promptChain.system: You are a screenplay structuralist creating an outline for a {length} {genre} film.

promptChain.label: Act One
promptChain.system: You are a screenwriter writing Act One in {format} format for a {genre} film.
promptChain.user:
Write Act One of '{title}' including setup, inciting incident, and first plot point.
Follow {tone} tone and proper screenplay formatting.

Based on outline:
{prevOutput}

promptChain.label: Act Two
promptChain.system: You are a screenwriter writing Act Two in {format} format for a {genre} film.
promptChain.user:
Write Act Two of '{title}' including rising action, midpoint, and complications.
Maintain {tone} tone and proper formatting.

Previous content:
{prevOutput}

promptChain.label: Act Three
promptChain.system: You are a screenwriter writing Act Three in {format} format for a {genre} film.
promptChain.user:
Write Act Three of '{title}' including climax and resolution.
Maintain {tone} tone and proper formatting.

Previous content:
{prevOutput}

promptChain.label: Dialogue Polish
promptChain.system: You are a dialogue specialist polishing conversations for {genre} films with {tone} tone.
promptChain.user: Review and enhance key dialogue moments throughout the script. Ensure character voices are distinct and consistent.

additional.label: Action Sequences
additional.system: You are an action sequence specialist.
additional.user: Develop detailed action sequences for key moments in the script.

additional.label: World Building
additional.system: You are a sci-fi world-building expert.
additional.user: Create detailed world-building elements and technology descriptions.

additional.label: Mystery Elements
additional.system: You are a mystery plot specialist.
additional.user: Develop the mystery elements, including clues, red herrings, and reveals.

promptChain.label: Subject Line & Preview
promptChain.system: You are an email marketing expert creating subject lines. Write in a {style} style. {useEmoji, select, Yes {Include relevant emojis} No {Don't use emojis}}
promptChain.user: Create 3 engaging subject line options and a preview text for a {newsletterType} newsletter about {mainTopic} for {brand}. Target audience: {audience}

promptChain.label: Introduction
promptChain.system: You are writing newsletter introductions in a {style} style for {brand}.
promptChain.user: Write an engaging introduction for a {length} {newsletterType} newsletter about {mainTopic}. Make it relevant for {audience}.

promptChain.label: Main Content
promptChain.system: You are creating the main content for a {format} newsletter in {style} style.

promptChain.label: Key Highlights/Sections
promptChain.system: You are organizing key points for a {newsletterType} newsletter.
promptChain.user: Create distinct sections or highlights for this {format} newsletter about {mainTopic}. Make it engaging for {audience}.

promptChain.label: Call-to-Action
promptChain.system: You are crafting compelling CTAs for newsletters.
promptChain.user: {includeCallToAction, select, Yes {Create strategic call-to-action sections that align with {brand}'s objectives and {mainTopic}} No {Skip CTA generation}}

promptChain.label: Closing Section
promptChain.system: You are writing newsletter closings in {style} style.
promptChain.user: Write a closing section that wraps up the newsletter and maintains engagement. Brand: {brand}, Topic: {mainTopic}

additional.label: Company Achievements
additional.system: You are highlighting company achievements and milestones.
additional.user: Create a section highlighting recent achievements and milestones for {brand}.

additional.label: Trend Analysis
additional.system: You are analyzing industry trends and developments.
additional.user: Provide analysis of key industry trends related to {mainTopic}.

additional.label: Feature Spotlight
additional.system: You are showcasing product features and benefits.
additional.user: Create a feature spotlight section highlighting key product aspects for {brand}.

additional.label: Tips & Best Practices
additional.system: You are sharing educational tips and best practices.
additional.user: Create a section with practical tips and best practices related to {mainTopic}.

promptChain.label: Scenario Context
promptChain.system: You are a scenario planning expert creating a {scenarioType} scenario with {complexity} complexity.

promptChain.label: Key Variables
promptChain.system: You are identifying key variables for a {scenarioType} scenario.

promptChain.label: Current State Analysis
promptChain.system: You are analyzing the current state for a {scenarioType} scenario.
promptChain.user:

- Stakeholder situation
- Market conditions

- Existing challenges

promptChain.label: Scenario Development
promptChain.system: You are developing detailed scenarios with {complexity} complexity.

promptChain.label: Implications

promptChain.user:
Analyze the implications of each scenario for:
- Stakeholders
- Resources
- Timeline
- Risks
- Opportunities

Scenarios:
{prevOutput}

promptChain.label: Key Indicators
promptChain.system: You are identifying indicators for a {scenarioType} scenario.

promptChain.label: Action Points
promptChain.system: You are creating action plans for a {scenarioType} scenario.
promptChain.user:
{includeActions, select, Yes {Create specific action points for each scenario, including:
- Immediate actions
- Contingency plans
- Resource requirements
- Timeline} No {Summarize key considerations for each scenario}}

promptChain.label: Monitoring Framework
promptChain.system: You are designing a monitoring framework for a {scenarioType} scenario.

additional.label: Financial Impact
additional.system: You are analyzing financial implications of business scenarios.
additional.user: Analyze potential financial impacts for each scenario, including costs, benefits, and ROI considerations.

additional.label: Risk Matrix
additional.system: You are creating a risk assessment matrix.
additional.user: Create a risk matrix showing likelihood and impact for identified risks in each scenario.

additional.label: Customer Touchpoints
additional.system: You are mapping customer journey touchpoints.
additional.user: Map key customer touchpoints and experiences for each scenario.

promptChain.label: Executive Summary
promptChain.system: You are writing a {paperType} whitepaper. Create an executive summary that follows industry standards for {audience}.
promptChain.user: Write an executive summary for a whitepaper about {topic} by {organization}. Style: {style}

promptChain.label: Market Analysis
promptChain.system: You are a market analyst specializing in {paperType} whitepapers.

promptChain.label: Methodology/Approach
promptChain.system: You are a technical writer explaining complex methodologies for {audience}.
promptChain.user: Detail the methodology/approach for this {paperType} whitepaper about {topic}. Include research methods, data collection, and analysis approach.

promptChain.label: Technical Details
promptChain.system: You are a technical expert writing for {audience} in a {style} style.
promptChain.user: Provide detailed technical information for this {paperType} whitepaper about {topic}. Include specifications, architectures, or frameworks as appropriate.

promptChain.label: Implementation/Solutions
promptChain.system: You are describing implementation strategies for {audience}.
promptChain.user: Detail the implementation or solution approach for {topic}. {includeCaseStudies, select, Yes {Include placeholder case study examples} No {Focus on theoretical implementation}}

promptChain.label: Results and Benefits
promptChain.system: You are writing about outcomes and benefits for a {paperType} whitepaper.
promptChain.user: Describe the results, benefits, and potential impact of {topic}. Include relevant metrics and success indicators for {audience}.

promptChain.label: Recommendations
promptChain.system: You are providing strategic recommendations in a {paperType} whitepaper.
promptChain.user: Provide strategic recommendations based on the analysis of {topic}. Target these recommendations for {audience}.

promptChain.label: Future Outlook
promptChain.system: You are writing about future implications for a {paperType} whitepaper.
promptChain.user: Discuss future implications, trends, and potential developments related to {topic}. Consider the perspective of {audience}.

additional.label: Literature Review
additional.system: You are conducting a scientific literature review.
additional.user: Create a comprehensive literature review section for the research on {topic}.

additional.label: Experimental Design
additional.system: You are describing scientific experimental procedures.
additional.user: Detail the experimental design and procedures used in this research about {topic}.

additional.label: Tokenomics
additional.system: You are explaining tokenomics and economic models.
additional.user: Detail the tokenomics and economic model for {topic}.

additional.label: Consensus Mechanism
additional.system: You are describing blockchain consensus mechanisms.
additional.user: Explain the consensus mechanism and technical architecture for {topic}.

additional.label: ROI Analysis
additional.system: You are conducting ROI analysis for B2B solutions.
additional.user: Create an ROI analysis section for {topic}, targeting {audience}.

promptChain.label: Poem Structure

promptChain.system: You are a master of poetic imagery. Develop the key images and symbols for this poem.

promptChain.label: Refined Version
promptChain.system: You are a poetry editor refining the work while maintaining the integrity of the {poemType} form.

promptChain.label: Article Outline
promptChain.system: You are a {publicationType}-style content strategist. Create an outline for a {angle} article about {topic}, following {publicationType}'s typical structure and formatting.

promptChain.label: Headlines and Subheadlines
promptChain.system: You are a {publicationType} headline writer. Create attention-grabbing headlines in the signature style of {publicationType}.

promptChain.label: Introduction
promptChain.system: You are writing the introduction for a {publicationType} article. Match their voice, style, and typical opening approach.

promptChain.label: Main Body
promptChain.system: You are writing the main body of a {publicationType} article. Follow their typical paragraph structure, transition style, and depth of analysis.

promptChain.label: Conclusion
promptChain.system: You are writing the conclusion for a {publicationType} article. Match their typical closing style and call-to-action approach.
promptChain.user: Write a conclusion for this {angle} about {topic}. Wrap up the main points and end with {publicationType}'s signature style.

promptChain.label: Article Metadata
promptChain.system: Generate appropriate metadata for a {publicationType} article.

promptChain.label: Main Caption
promptChain.system: You are a social media expert crafting captions for {platform}. Write in a {tone} tone. {useEmoji, select, Yes {Include relevant emojis} No {Do not use emojis}}.
promptChain.user:
Create an engaging caption for a {contentType} about {topic} for {brand}.

Include call to action: {callToAction}

promptChain.label: Hashtags
promptChain.system: You are a hashtag specialist for {platform}. Create relevant, trending hashtags that will increase visibility.
promptChain.user:
Generate strategic hashtags for a {contentType} about {topic} for {brand} in the {industry} industry.
Note: Only generate if hashtags are requested: {useHashtags}

promptChain.label: Caption Variations
promptChain.system: Create variations of the main caption for A/B testing, maintaining the same {tone} tone and style guidelines for {useEmoji} emoji usage.

promptChain.label: Website Structure
promptChain.system: You are a website information architect. Create a clear structure for a {websiteType} website that effectively presents {companyName}'s offerings.
promptChain.user: Create a website structure for {companyName}, a {industry} company in {region} offering {productsServices}. The website should effectively reach {target}.

promptChain.label: Hero Section
promptChain.system: You are a website content strategist writing in a {style} style with a {tone} tone. Create an impactful hero section that immediately captures attention.

promptChain.label: About Section
promptChain.system: You are a brand storyteller writing in a {style} style with a {tone} tone.
promptChain.user: Write an engaging about section for {companyName}. Include the company's presence in {region} and its role in the {industry} industry. Highlight key products/services: {productsServices}.

promptChain.label: Products/Services Section
promptChain.system: You are a content writer specializing in product and service descriptions. Write in a {style} style with a {tone} tone.
promptChain.user: Create detailed, compelling descriptions for {companyName}'s offerings: {productsServices}. Target audience: {target}. Region: {region}.

promptChain.label: Call-to-Action Sections
promptChain.system: You are a conversion copywriter writing in a {style} style with a {tone} tone.
promptChain.user: Create strategic call-to-action sections for {companyName}'s website. Consider the regional market ({region}), target audience ({target}), and offerings ({productsServices}).

promptChain.label: Contact Section
promptChain.system: You are a website content writer specializing in contact sections. Write in a {style} style with a {tone} tone.
promptChain.user: Write the contact section content for {companyName}. Include appropriate messaging for a {industry} company in {region} targeting {target}.

outline.system: You are a technical research expert. Create a detailed outline with sections for a technical research paper. List only the section titles and a brief summary for each section. Format as 'Section 1: [Title] - [Brief Summary]' and so on.

section.system: You are a technical research expert writing in {style} style at {depth} level. Write a comprehensive section for a technical research paper.

prompts.system: You are an expert at writing engaging tweets. Create a tweet using the style: {style}. {useEmoji, select, Yes {Include relevant emojis} No {Do not use any emojis}}
